plot: This is an experimental documentary about one family's life in the grandparents house told through contemporary and home video footage. It is the house itself that is the character of the film, while the people in it are the background.
title: Granny's House
plot_es: This is an experimental documentary about one family's life in the grandparents house told through contemporary and home video footage. It is the house itself that is the character of the film, while the people in it are the background.
plot_en: This is an experimental documentary about one family's life in the grandparents house told through contemporary and home video footage. It is the house itself that is the character of the film, while the people in it are the background.
